document.full_text: roger federer was on and off court in a flash friday in his latest attempt to sneak up on the french open field and catch them unawares with his almost forgotten brilliance.
document.title: federer lurking with intent after easy win
lines_and_colors: roger federer was on and off court in a flash friday in his latest attempt to sneak up on the french open field and catch them unawares with his almost forgotten brilliance.
